structure.unit: RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, AND EDUCATIONAL SOCIETIES -- NONSTOCK, NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS

text.section: In addition to required services and activities to be provided with funds made available under the federal act, these funds may be used to provide on an emergency basis for the provision of such supplies and services to meet immediate essential needs of low-income persons including the elderly poor.

law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 453, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1982.
